text: Ordered pan pizza,and didn't get it, and it did not taste good, I will not go back there again....

name: Katie Moritz
text: The food is fine.  It’s Pizza Hut and I like Pizza Hut.  I love that they still have the lunch buffet.  One of the servers (can’t remember her name but she’s a big cubs fan, if that helps) is really nice. She’s very attentive .  One of them …More

name: Corbin Spence
text: two days ago was our first time we visited this restaurant. But It is obviously not the last time. We enjoyed the evening very much with the excellent service, with the fine  meal and booze and with the decent charge. We will absolutely return there in a short time.

name: Lidia Serrano
text: Great friendly and good food they are good at keeping the buffet well stocked.

name: Bill Rastello
text: Dearest Pizza Hut. You make my heart run wild, deep into the sauce of tomatoes. Your clever new innovations always keep things interesting. How could I not visit you? My doctor doesn't need to know everything

text: Good and greasy,  but could of used more crust flavoring.

text: The staff were very hospitable, kind and made delicious food. They did an all around awesome job. Look foward to going back again.

text: Waiter was super nice and friendly! Would go back again food was out fast. Felt very welcoming and wanted there. Glad we could sit down and eat in since sandwich area got rid of their sit down restaurant!

name: Omar Murillo
text: The best pizza ever. You cant even begin to imagine the taste. deeeeeeeeliccccioussssss. Better than Suzys, Uncle Lars, Macianos, Anastonis, Rosatis and Caseys.

text: (Former employee.) I worked there for one week and quit after seeing the back of restaurant where they prep food absolutely disgusting I cant believe this place is allowed to serve food. Do not eat here they have ants crawling out of the …More

text: I have been here a few times 1 time the service was eh not so good, the other times where great and once we went in and a guy who never seated tables took our orders and served us food and was very very nice, I would say one of the cooler …More

text: Placed an online order for a large two topping pizza and put a pick up time for 6:45 Got email confirmation saying pizza will be ready at 6:45. I got there at 6:40 I paid for pizza then they couldn't find it so they said they'll make …More

name: Madison Tobias
text: The pizza was good. The waitress gave us a lot of free sauce. The wait time was not long at all and they were mostly friendly besides a little confusion on their end. I like that this location still has a buffet.

name: RJ Mitchell
text: Someone call the Health Dept. I’ve always used carry out. The restaurant is disgusting. The kitchen was a cluttered mess. I don’t even want to know the uncleanliness of the food prep area. This building is long outdated and needs help fast. Ignorance was bliss but not anymore. Fail!

name: Joe S.
text: Staff is always friendly and food is comsistent.

name: Ron Pugh
text: It's a Tuesday night and only 1 guy working. By himself. Seriously?

text: Absolutely WORST service for delivery. One incident a couple of months back: placed an order online at 9:30 PM and the app showed it was being made. 2 hrs later no delivery, called the store no answer. They were closed. Called the next day …More

text: DO NOT GO HERE! I can honestly say this was the most memorable dining experience I have ever had as being the worst. We were seated and sat there for probably 20 minutes until a lady came and got our drinks then proceeded to take another 15 …More

text: The staff was friendly and the restaurant was much cleaner then past visits. My pizza had alot of air bubbles and hardly any cheese at the crust. Price was ok check online for specials.

text: This place is simply disgusting, I worked here for 2 days and could not stand it. There are standing puddles over an inch deep in front of the pizza make line and the people making your food have to stand in that and get their pants and …More

text: So usually have a good experience here but tonight was not good. I order online then called to add another pizza to my order wich ok they added there's like 6 people waiting before me. Dine in customers waited 1 hour for their pizza. The …More

text: Staff always seems lost and backed up. Wait times are ridiculous. Pizza is just pizza so its great.

name: Dave Encinas
text: Lately the quality and cleanliness has gone DOWNHILL. Facility hasn't been cleaned, staff in kitchen never wears hair nets.  What was once a great family meal has now become a place to be avoided. We no longer eat there but we no longer order takeout due to the filth issue

name: Alfredo Fonseca
text: Poor delivery service. Food delivered tasted like it was made hours earlier. And the second time we tried it we redeemed points and that was just as bad. I rather drive to the one in Montgomery than order from this one again  Hopefully a new one opens up.

text: Most disappointing was that the salad bar is shrinking...no eggs, mushrooms, cottage cheese, chow mein noodles. Had to wait a while for dessert stick refill. Other food was good. Employees were attentive and friendly.

text: The service was good the food was hot but it didn't taste very good at all I guess I was trying to compare the price of what you pay to Pizza Hut's all you can eat buffet to Cici's all you can eat buffet there's just no price comparison the …More

text: Fast service. Great specials. Always busy. Fantastic staff. Have been coming here for years.

text: Must be poorly managed. Walked in for lunch, waited 5 minutes to be seated to be told lunch buffet end in 7 minutes (at 1pm?). Every empty table was dirty, not cleared and no salad on salad bar whatsoever and told wouldn't refill. Never again unless they get better management in that place.

text: Their buffet-style salad is alright. Their wings (especially the garlic-parmesan flavored ones) are good. The Personal Pan Pizza should allow more ingredients, currently only allows 3 toppings for ~$5 is not good value for money! The …More

name: Stephanie Price
text: Placed and paid for an order at 10:30 this evening... they closed at 11. The order said it would take 45 minutes, it after 12 and still no pizza. We call and no answer. My husband drives to the store and it's closed. They took our order and our money and never delivered. That's beyond poor service, that's theft!
